Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Worker
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionControllerTest.WorkerStub, Apollo, Ares, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Charon, ControllerTest.WorkerStub, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hestia, Minotaur, Pan, Prometheus, Triton, WorkerTest.WorkerStub, Zeus
public abstract class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
Worker class defines an abstract class used by every god card .

    • move

      public boolean move​(Space space) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Method move changes the worker's position while checking winning condition.
      Parameters:
      space - of type Space - the new position.
      Returns:
      boolean false if the worker can't move into this space, true otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when space is null.

    • move

      public boolean move​(Space space, GameBoard gameBoard)
      Method move returns false if it isn't a Minotaur worker.
      Parameters:
      space - of type Space - the space where worker wants to move to.
      gameBoard - of type GameBoard - the game board.
      Returns:
      boolean false if it isn't a Minotaur, true otherwise.

    • winCondition

      public boolean winCondition​(Space space)
      Method winCondition checks if win condition is satisfied.
      Parameters:
      space - of type Space - the space provided.
      Returns:
      boolean true if worker has won, false otherwise.

    • isSelectable

      public boolean isSelectable​(Space space) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Method isSelectable returns true if the worker can move to the space received.
      Parameters:
      space - of type Space - the space provided.
      Returns:
      boolean true if space is selectable, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when space is null.

    • canMoveTo

      protected boolean canMoveTo​(Space space)
      Method canMoveto returns true if the space is neighbor to worker's position and if it's possible to move to that space.
      Parameters:
      space - of type Space - the space provided.
      Returns:
      boolean true if space is reachable and at the correct height, false otherwise.

    • notifyWithMoves

      public void notifyWithMoves​(GameBoard gameBoard) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.IllegalStateException
      Method notifyWithMoves notifies the selectSpacesListener with all the moves the worker can do.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - of type GameBoard - the game board.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when gameBoard is null.
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - when the worker is blocked.

    • selectMoves

      public java.util.List<Space> selectMoves​(GameBoard gameBoard)
      Method selectMoves returns a List that contains the spaces which the worker can move to.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - of type GameBoard - the game board.
      Returns:
      List<Space> - the list of spaces.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when gameBoard is null.
      java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException - when the worker is blocked, so it cannot move.

    • build

      public boolean build​(Space space, boolean buildDome)
      Method build returns false if it isn't an Atlas worker.
      Parameters:
      space - of type Space - the space provided.
      buildDome - of type boolean - checker used for PLACEDOME action.
      Returns:
      boolean

    • build

      public boolean build​(Space space) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Method build checks if the space is buildable and build on the space received.
      Parameters:
      space - of type Space - the space provided.
      Returns:
      boolean false if it's impossible to build on the space or if OutOfBoundException is thrown, true otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when space is null.

    • canBuildOnto

      public boolean canBuildOnto​(Space space) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Method canBuildOnto returns true if the worker can build into the space received.
      Parameters:
      space - of type Space - the space provided.
      Returns:
      boolean true if space can build onto, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when space is null

    • isReachable

      protected boolean isReachable​(Space space)
      Method isReachable checks if provided space is at unitary distance or without a tower completed.
      Parameters:
      space - of type Space - the space provided.
      Returns:
      boolean true if reachable, false otherwise.

    • notifyWithBuildable

      public void notifyWithBuildable​(GameBoard gameBoard) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.IllegalStateException
      Method notifyWithBuildable notifies the selectSpaceListener with all the spaces on which the worker can build onto.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - of type GameBoard - the game board.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when gameBoard is null.
      java.lang.IllegalStateException

    • getBuildableSpaces

      public java.util.List<Space> getBuildableSpaces​(GameBoard gameBoard)
      Method getBuildableSpaces returns an List which contains all the buildable spaces.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - of type GameBoard - GameBoard reference.
      Returns:
      List<Space> - the list of spaces.

    • isPerimeter

      public boolean isPerimeter​(Space space)
      Method isPerimeter indicates whether the space is a perimeter space or not.
      Parameters:
      space - of type Space - the selected space.
      Returns:
      boolean true if space is a perimeter space, false if it is not.

    • exists

      public boolean exists​(Couple coordinates)
      Method exists indicates whether the coordinates exists into the gameBoard.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - of type Couple - the coordinates of the space provided.
      Returns:
      boolean true if a space is associated to the coordinates, false if coordinates exceed gameBoard bounds.

    • canForceOn

      public boolean canForceOn​(Space space)
      Method canForceOn indicates whether an opponent worker can be forced into the space.
      Parameters:
      space - of type Space - the space selected.
      Returns:
      boolean true if the opponent worker can be forced into the space, false if it can not (for example, whether the space is not empty or there is a completed tower on it).
